2065250.name: Project Galaxy
2065250.description: Project Galaxy is a 2-dimensional version of the Roblox game "Galaxy" which is an open-world space MMO. This version of the game is one-player and is made to be a prequel to the Roblox version. Featuring ships, bases, planets, and core game mechanics from the Roblox version, this adaptation also features new game mechanics, ships, aliens, and bases to encounter. Your mission is to go into this new sector of space and fulfill a contract by mining the sector's asteroids and surviving the hostile alien-infested territory.
2065250.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
